intro: Train gladiators, conquer the arena, build your legacy!
description:
Step into the brutal world of ancient Rome in Survival Gladiator: Blades of the Coliseum, a 3D game of action and strategy where you manage your own gladiator empire. As a master of gladiators, your mission is to train and equip your fighters, sending them into fierce battles in the Coliseum to prove their strength and earn glory.

Key Features:
- Train and Equip Gladiators: Purchase new weapons and armours, build gladiator schools, and train your fighters based on their unique types, from agile sword wielders to trident and fishnet handlers.

- Manage Gladiator Resources: Take care of your gladiators' living conditions, ensuring they stay strong and ready for battle. Proper care increases their morale and performance in the arena.

- Buy and Train Slaves: Acquire slaves and turn them into powerful gladiators, training them to become champions in your arena. You can also put them up for auction to earn additional profits.

- Dynamic Combat and Strategy: Each gladiator type has unique abilities and fighting styles, requiring strategic preparation for each fight. Plan your tactics wisely to ensure victory in the bloody arenas.

As you progress, the stakes rise, and every decision you make influences both your fighters' fates and your legacy. Can you build an unstoppable gladiator force and conquer the arena, or will the weight of your responsibilities bring you down?
